xrefdescription.para: Use NWNX_Visibility Visibility Types instead. The various types of visibilities.

description.para: The various types of timing bars.

briefdescription.para: Force display placeable examine window for player.

simplesect.para: If used on a placeable in a different area than the player, the portait will not be shown.

briefdescription.para: Force opens the target object's inventory for the player.

listitem.para: If the placeable is in a different area than the player, the portrait will not be shown
The placeable's open/close animations will be played

Clicking the 'close' button will cause the player to walk to the placeable If the placeable is in a different area, the player will just walk to the edge of the current area and stop. This action can be cancelled manually.
Walking will close the placeable automatically.

memberdef.argsstring: (object player, float seconds, string script="", int type=NWNX_PLAYER_TIMING_BAR_CUSTOM)
memberdef.name: NWNX_Player_StartGuiTimingBar

briefdescription.para: Starts displaying a timing bar.

parameterdescription.para: The length of time the timing bar will complete.
The script to run at the bar's completion.

simplesect.para: Only one timing bar can be ran at the same time.

briefdescription.para: Stop displaying a timing bar.

parameterdescription.para: The script to run when stopped.

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the player should always walk when given movement commands.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE to set the player to always walk.

simplesect.para: Clicking on the ground or using WASD will trigger walking instead of running.

briefdescription.para: Gets the player's quickbar slot info.

memberdef.argsstring: (object player, int slot, struct NWNX_Player_QuickBarSlot qbs)
memberdef.name: NWNX_Player_SetQuickBarSlot

briefdescription.para: Sets the player's quickbar slot info.
Get the name of the .bic file associated with the player's character.

simplesect.para: The filename for this player's bic. (Not including the ".bic")

briefdescription.para: Overrides the default visibility rules about how player perceives the target object.
Queries the existing visibility override for given (player, object) pair.
Plays the VFX at the target position in current area for the given player only.

parameterdescription.para: The position to play the visual effect.

briefdescription.para: Changes the daytime music track for the given player only.
Changes the nighttime music track for the given player only.
Starts the background music for the given player only.
Stops the background music for the given player only.
Changes the battle music track for the given player only.
Starts the battle music for the given player only.
Stops the battle music for the given player only.
Play a sound at the location of target for the given player only.

parameterdescription.para: The target object for the sound to originate. If target OBJECT_INVALID the sound will play at the location of the player.

briefdescription.para: Toggle a placeable's usable flag for the given player only.
Override player's rest duration.

parameterdescription.para: The duration of rest in milliseconds, 1000 = 1 second. Minimum duration of 10ms. -1 clears the override.

briefdescription.para: Apply visualeffect to target that only player can see.

parameterdescription.para: The target object to play the effect upon.

simplesect.para: Only works with instant effects: VFX_COM_*, VFX_FNF_*, VFX_IMP_*

briefdescription.para: Refreshes the players character sheet.

simplesect.para: You may need to use DelayCommand if you're manipulating values through nwnx and forcing a UI refresh, 0.5s seemed to be fine

briefdescription.para: Allows player to open target's inventory.

parameterdescription.para: The target object, must be a creature or another player.

simplesect.para: Only works if player and target are in the same area.

briefdescription.para: Get player's area exploration state.

simplesect.para: A string representation of the tiles explored for that area.

briefdescription.para: Set player's area exploration state.

parameterdescription.para: An encoded string obtained with NWNX_Player_GetAreaExplorationState()

briefdescription.para: Override player's rest animation.

parameterdescription.para: The NWNX animation id. This does not take ANIMATION_LOOPING_* or ANIMATION_FIREFORGET_* constants. Instead use NWNX_Consts_TranslateNWScriptAnimation() to get the NWNX equivalent. -1 to clear the override.

memberdef.argsstring: (object oPlayer, object oObject, int nTransform, float fValue)
memberdef.name: NWNX_Player_SetObjectVisualTransformOverride

briefdescription.para: Override a visual transform on the given object that only player will see.

parameterdescription.para: The target object. Can be any valid Creature, Placeable, Item or Door.
One of OBJECT_VISUAL_TRANSFORM_* or -1 to remove the override.
Depends on the transformation to apply.

briefdescription.para: Apply a looping visualeffect to a target that only player can see.

parameterdescription.para: A VFX_DUR_*. Calling again will remove an applied effect. -1 to remove all effects

simplesect.para: Only really works with looping effects: VFX_DUR_*. Other types kind of work, they'll play when reentering the area and the object is in view or when they come back in view range.

briefdescription.para: Override the name of placeable for player only.

parameterdescription.para: The name for the placeable for this player, "" to clear the override.

briefdescription.para: Gets whether a quest has been completed by a player.

parameterdescription.para: The name identifier of the quest from the Journal Editor.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the quest has been completed. -1 if the player does not have the journal entry.

memberdef.argsstring: (string sCDKeyOrCommunityName, string sBicFileName, object oWP, int bFirstConnectOnly=TRUE)
memberdef.name: NWNX_Player_SetPersistentLocation

briefdescription.para: Place waypoints on module load representing where a PC should start.

detaileddescription.para: This will require storing the PC's cd key or community name (depending on how you store in your vault) and bic_filename along with routinely updating their location in some persistent method like OnRest, OnAreaEnter and OnClentExit.

parameterdescription.para: The Public CD Key or Community Name of the player, this will depend on your vault type.
The filename for the character. Retrieved with NWNX_Player_GetBicFileName().
The waypoint object to place where the PC should start.
Set to FALSE if you would like the PC to go to this location every time they login instead of just every server restart.

briefdescription.para: Force an item name to be updated.

simplesect.para: This is a workaround for bug that occurs when updating item names in open containers.
